text: Margaux Vigie (born 21 July 1995) is a French professional racing cyclist, who currently rides since 2020 with the UCI Women's Continental Team Valcar–Travel & Service. Vigie rode in the 2022 Tour de France Femmes. She represented France at the 2022 European Road Championships in Münich. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:French cyclists Category:Sportswomen Category:People from Haute- Garonne Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie
title: Margaux Vigie
